data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Chelsea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 1, Southampton to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
Can Chelsea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
In the minute 3, In London Chelsea drive forward through Benjamin Chilwell. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Kai Havertz gets his shot on target but fails to score for Chelsea.
Peter Bankes blows against Chelsea's Kai Havertz for offside.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Southampton in the half of Chelsea.
Throw-in Chelsea.
Free kick for Chelsea in their own half.
In the minute 6, Christian Pulisic (Chelsea) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Ball safe as Chelsea is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 8, Chelsea are pushing forward but Timo Werner's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Southampton at Stamford Bridge.
Southampton's Che Adams is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 9, Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Peter Bankes awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Chelsea in the half of Southampton.
In the minute 12, In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in high up the field for Southampton in London.
In London Chelsea's Timo Werner is caught offside.
In the minute 15, Goal! Timo Werner gives Chelsea a 1-0 lead.
Benjamin Chilwell instrumental with a fine assist.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 17, Peter Bankes signals a throw-in for Southampton, close to Chelsea's area.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
Chelsea's Christian Pulisic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Southampton defender.
In the minute 20, Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Peter Bankes signals a Chelsea throw-in in Southampton's half.
Southampton are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 22, Nathan Redmond (Southampton) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
Throw-in for Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.
In the minute 25, Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Chelsea to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
Mason Mount (Chelsea) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 26, Chelsea's Kai Havertz gets in a shot on goal at Stamford Bridge. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Southampton have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Chelsea is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Chelsea in their own half.
Chelsea move into a more comfortable 2-0 lead. Timo Werner is the scorer with a header!
In the minute 28, Jorginho with an assist there.
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Chelsea's Kurt Zouma goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Southampton at Stamford Bridge.
Peter Bankes awards Southampton a goal kick.
Chelsea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 34, Peter Bankes signals a Southampton throw-in in Chelsea's half.
Danny Ings of Southampton is pulled up for offside.
Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chelsea's half?
In London Chelsea attack through Timo Werner. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Southampton goal kick.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Chelsea.
Ball goes out of play for a Southampton goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 42, Southampton have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Chelsea.
Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 2-1 through a strike by Danny Ings. .
In the minute 43, Great play from Che Adams to set up the goal.
Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chelsea's half?
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Southampton close to the penalty box.
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
The first-half has come to a close in London.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Stamford Bridge.
Goal kick for Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Peter Bankes awards Chelsea a goal kick.
Free kick Southampton.
In the minute 48, At Stamford Bridge, Benjamin Chilwell has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Chelsea in their own half.
Can Chelsea capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Southampton's half?
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Southampton.
In the minute 54, Southampton's Danny Ings breaks free at Stamford Bridge. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Chelsea have a goal kick.
Chelsea needs to be cautious. Southampton have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 56, Southampton drives forward and Kyle Walker-Peters gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goal! Che Adams levels the match at 2-2.
Kai Havertz is on target to give Chelsea a 3-2 advantage.
In the minute 59, That's a fine assist from Timo Werner.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
In the minute 61, Peter Bankes awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Southampton.
Southampton needs to be cautious. Chelsea have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 64, Peter Bankes awards Southampton a goal kick.
Throw-in Southampton.
Peter Bankes signals a Southampton throw-in in Chelsea's half.
In the minute 66, Chelsea to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 67, Peter Bankes signals a Chelsea throw-in in Southampton's half.
Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
Southampton have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
In the minute 69, Southampton surge into the attack at Stamford Bridge but Oriol Romeu’s header is off-target.
Chelsea have a goal kick.
Peter Bankes awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Southampton to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Chelsea.
In the minute 72, Hakim Ziyech is replacing Mason Mount for Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.
Ball safe as Chelsea is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Chelsea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
In the minute 77, Chelsea's Kai Havertz attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Southampton at Stamford Bridge.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Nathan Tella is on a sub for Nathan Redmond for Southampton.
In the minute 78, Southampton's Che Adams gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Chelsea goal kick.
Can Southampton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Chelsea's half?
In the minute 80, Free kick for Chelsea in their own half.
Throw-in for Southampton at Stamford Bridge.
Danny Ings for Southampton drives towards goal at Stamford Bridge. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 82, Throw-in high up the field for Southampton in London.
Southampton have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal kick for Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.
In the minute 84, Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Chelsea.
Southampton's Oriol Romeu has been booked in London.
Free kick for Chelsea in the half of Southampton.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Southampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ralph Hasenhuttl (Southampton) is making a second substitution, with Shane Long replacing Che Adams.
The away team have replaced Oriol Romeu with Ibrahima Diallo. This is the third substitution made today by Ralph Hasenhuttl.
In the minute 87, Frank Lampard is making the team's second substitution at Stamford Bridge with Reece James replacing Christian Pulisic.
Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Stamford Bridge the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Chelsea in the half of Southampton.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
Southampton's Theo Walcott misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Chelsea goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 3-3.
Chelsea make their third substitution with Tammy Abraham replacing Timo Werner.
Goal! Jannik Vestergaard (Southampton) levels the score at 3-3 with a header.
Great play from Theo Walcott to set up the goal.
